verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H4444>Malchi-shua,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>sore<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H4672>hit<s%> him, and he was <S%H2342>wounded<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3384>archers.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5375>armorbearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H8025>Draw<s%> thy <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and thrust me <S%H1856>through<s%> therewith; <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> me. But his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he was sore <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H3966><s%> So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

And when his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> then they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in them.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H4480>on<s%> the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And when they had <S%H6584>stripped<s%> him, they <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> to carry <S%H1319>tidings<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> and to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1538>head<s%> in the <S%H1004>temple<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>

They <S%H6965>arose,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and took <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1480>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H1480>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> in <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> for his <S%H4604>transgression<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> for <S%H7592>asking<s%> counsel of one that had a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of it;

And <S%H1875>inquired<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> therefore he <S%H4191>slew<s%> him, and <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse.<s%>
